dimension: 37 1/2 x 14 in. (95.25 x 35.56 cm) (width at waist)
title: Sleeveless Jacket (?), from a three-piece set
description: black top with stand up collar on a gusset with panels of cross stitch embroidery and applique on each side; some trim on collar and gusset; plain white bottom and streamers from shoulder; no sleeves, back or sides
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
